page.title: 18Clubs
page.content: Though small villages,St.Boswells and Newtown boast an abundance of clubs. Preschool :Playgroups,toddler groups. 7-11yrs :Brownies,Cubs,Youth Club, Music Club,Sunday School. 11-15yrs :Guides,Ranger Guides,Youth Club,Red Cross,A.T.C.,Bible Class. ADULT GROUPS. Church :Young Women's Group,Women's Guild The Arts :St.Boswells Village Band St.Boswells Drama Group Sportand :Bowling,Rugby,Cricket,Golf, Leisure Tennis,Short Tennis,Yoga, Keep Fit,Darts,Angling. Social :British Legion Club,Village Committee,Horticultural Society,Hall Committee, Community Council. Voluntary :W.R.V.S.,O.A.P's Assoc. School :P.T.A.,P.F.A.
